title: 79 Riot Points off Lucian.
body: Can i please have 79 Riot Points. I really want Lucian and he is now on sale. Please add it onto the account LeDooley. If you are allowed to do this I will be extremely grateful. Thank you.

replies.body: 79 RP is a moderate amount, you know. People only usually ask if they're only 3 or less RP off.
